summary: When three tight friends Mole "Alan Bennett", Ratty "Sir Michael Palin", and Badger "Sir Michael Gambon", find out that the infamous Mr. Toad "Rik Mayall" of Toad Hall has been up to no good, they must find him and change his ways for good.
cast: Alan Bennett|Michael Palin|Michael Gambon|Rik Mayall|James Villiers|Emma Chambers|Judy Cornwell|Enn Reitel|David Sinclair|Mark Lockyer|Vanessa Redgrave|Jemima Ffyne|Jordan Hollywood|Tom Stourton|Barry Foster
title: The Wind in the Willows
